name: BLACKBODY THEORY OF MOTION
description:
A black hole is a fascinating and inexplicable object.
A lot of mysterious things happen in black holes, and because light cannot escape its gravity, we know very little about them.
But one thing is for sure, the gravity of a black hole is so strong that even light cannot come out.
Our QQ group: 739927074

The game simulates the motion of black holes and the swallowing of celestial bodies.
You need to manipulate the black hole to slowly devour the surrounding objects, but not to encounter moving objects, such as stars, planets and comets.They can steal some of your mass.
Live well and eat more meteorites to grow stronger.As your mass increases, so will your size.For the fun of it, devour the meteorite!
Let's look at how to manipulate a black hole.
WS moves back and forth.
AD rotates left and right.
QE rotates upand sown.
ESC returns to the main interface.
